chapter.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; TCAP builds an abstraction layer over the protocol definition. It introduces a simplified API in favor of JAIN TCAP.

All interactions are handled by TCAP Dialog. Dialog aggregates local and remote transactions into a single reference. It maintains the state associated with both ends and supervises the proper encoding and content of exchanged primitives.
